steps.description: Unpack the components from the box, including a 1/2" flange, a 1/2" 90-degree elbow, a 1/2" 3" NIP, a 1/2" bushing, and a toothbrush holder tray.
steps.title: Unpack components

steps.description: Apply a small amount of glue to the inner rim of the 1/2" flange where the 3" NIP pipe will be inserted. Ensure the glue is evenly distributed.
steps.title: Apply glue to flange

steps.description: Firmly insert one end of the 1/2" 3" NIP pipe into the glued flange, twisting slightly to ensure a secure and even fit.
steps.title: Insert pipe into flange

steps.description: Apply glue to the inner rim of the 1/2" 90-degree elbow joint on the side that connects to the 3" NIP.
steps.title: Apply glue to elbow

steps.description: Attach the glued 1/2" elbow joint to the free end of the 3" NIP, again twisting slightly to ensure a snug fit.
steps.title: Attach elbow to pipe

steps.description: Put on the work gloves to protect hands during the next assembly steps.
steps.title: Put on gloves

steps.description: Apply glue to the inner rim of the toothbrush holder tray opening, where it will join with the 1/2" bushing.
steps.title: Apply glue to tray

steps.description: Attach the toothbrush holder tray onto the open end of the 1/2" bushing by firmly pressing it onto the glued end of the bushing connected to the elbow joint. Ensure the tray is level and properly aligned.
steps.title: Attach tray to elbow
